net.kuujo.vertigo.cluster

Annotation Type XyncType


  • @Target(value=TYPE)
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface XyncType
    Annotates a handler as being available in Xync mode.

    This annotation should be used for identifying types available within Vertigo components as being available when clustering with Xync. When a network is being run in a Xync cluster, Vertigo synchronization types must be supported by Xync. If clustering is not supported by a type then Vertigo will automatically fall back to a type that is supported.

    Author:
    Jordan Halterman
